lead_paragraph: More than 100 medical experts, academia and scientists on Friday have called for the Rio Olympic Games to be postponed or moved because of fears that the event could speed up the spread of the Zika virus around the world.

headline.print_headline: Medical Experts Want Rio Olympics Delayed or Moved Due to Zika
headline.main: Medical Experts Want Rio Olympics Delayed or Moved Due to Zika

snippet: More than 100 medical experts, academia and scientists on Friday have called for the Rio Olympic Games to be postponed or moved because of fears that the event could speed up the spread of the Zika virus around the world....
